snippet: Local law-enforcement agencies are rejecting the federal deportation dragnet.
abstract: Editorial notes that local law-enforcement agencies across the country, and particularly in New Orleans and California, are rejecting the blurring of the line that separated local cops and federal immigration agents; warns melding of local crime fighting and immigration enforcement has led to unjust imprisonment, policing abuses, racial profiling and paralyzing fear in immigrant communities.
lead_paragraph: Local law-enforcement agencies are rejecting the federal deportation dragnet.

headline.main: A Brighter Line on Immigration Policing
headline.print_headline: A Brighter Line on Immigration Policing
